com.gensym.types
Class G2Type

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.gensym.types.G2Type
Direct Known Subclasses:
CompoundType, SimpleType
public abstract class G2Type
extends Object
implements Serializable

G2Type is the root class for a set of java classes that can describe any G2 Type Specification.

See Also:
Serialized Form

G2Type

public G2Type()
Method Detail

makeG2TypeFromDescription

public static G2Type makeG2TypeFromDescription(Structure description)
This method makes a nested G2Type from a com.gensym.util.Structure that describes the attribute as received from the method getAttributeDescriptions from com.gensym.jgi.G2Access

pprint

public void pprint(PrintWriter out,
                   int indent)
pprint invokes the pretty printer for G2Types. It's output is akin to LISP pretty-printers.

pprintIndent

protected static void pprintIndent(PrintWriter out,
                                   int n)

includes

public boolean includes(Object o)
This method tests to see whether a given object is a member of a G2 type.

setPprintParameters

public static void setPprintParameters(int width,
                                       int indentIncrement)
This method sets width and indentation parameters of the G2Type pretty printer. The pretty printer attempts to use no more than width columns and indents the number of columns specified after inserting newlines.

parse

public Object parse(Reader reader)
             throws IOException,
                    EOFException
